verses.verse: I Exhort <S%G3870><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> Of All, <S%G3956><s%> To Be Made <S%G4160><s%> Supplications, <S%G1162><s%> Prayers, <S%G4335><s%> Intercessions, <S%G1783><s%> Thanksgivings, <S%G2169><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Men; <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G5228><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Dignity <S%G5247><s%> Are, <S%G5607><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> A Tranquil <S%G2263><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Quiet <S%G2272><s%> Life <S%G979><s%> We May Lead <S%G1236><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Piety <S%G2150><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gravity; <S%G4587><s%>
<S%G5124><s%> For This <S%G1063><s%> Is Good <S%G2570><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Acceptable <S%G587><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4990><s%> Our Saviour <S%G2257><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Wishes <S%G2309><s%> To Be Saved <S%G4982><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Knowledge <S%G1922><s%> Of The Truth <S%G225><s%> To Come. <S%G2064><s%>

<S%G1520><s%> For One <S%G1063><s%> God Is, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G1520><s%> And One <S%G2532><s%> The Mediator <S%G3316><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> The Man <S%G444><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> A Ransom <S%G487><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Testimony To Be Rendered <S%G3142><s%> In Times <S%G2540><s%> Its Own, <S%G2398><s%>

To <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Was Appointed <S%G5087><s%> I 1473 P-1NS A Herald 2783 N-NSM And 2532 CONJ Apostle, The 652 N-NSM Truth 225 N-ASF I Speak 3004 V-PAI-1S In 1722 PREP, Christ, 5547 N-DSM Not 3756 PRT-N I Do Lie, 5574 V-PNI-1S A Teacher 1320 N-NSM Of The Nations, 1484 N-GPN In 1722 PREP Faith 4102 N-DSF And 2532 CONJ Truth. 225 N-DSF

I Will <S%G1014><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> To Pray <S%G4336><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Place, <S%G5117><s%> Lifting Up <S%G1869><s%> Holy <S%G3741><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Apart From <S%G5565><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Reasoning. <S%G1261><s%>

In Like Manner <S%G5615><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Guise <S%G2689><s%> Seemly <S%G2887><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Modesty <S%G127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Discreetness <S%G4997><s%> To Adorn <S%G2885><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Plaitings, <S%G4117><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> , Gold, <S%G5557><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Pearls, <S%G3135><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Clothing <S%G2441><s%> Costly, <S%G4185><s%>
' But <S%G235><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Is Becoming <S%G4241><s%> To Women <S%G1135><s%> Professing <S%G1861><s%> The Fear Of God, <S%G2317><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Good. <S%G18><s%>
A Woman <S%G1135><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Quietness <S%G2271><s%> Let Learn <S%G3129><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Subjection; <S%G5292><s%>

<S%G1135><s%> But A Woman <S%G1161><s%> To Teach <S%G1321><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Do Not Allow, <S%G2010><s%> Nor To <S%G3761><s%> Exercise Authority Over <S%G831><s%> Man, <S%G435><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Quietness; <S%G2271><s%>
<S%G76><s%> For Adam <S%G1063><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Was Formed, <S%G4111><s%> Then <S%G1534><s%> Eve : <S%G2096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Adam <S%G76><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Deceived; <S%G538><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> Having Been Deceived, <S%G538><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Transgression <S%G3847><s%> Has Become. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G4982><s%> But She Shall Be Saved <S%G1161><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Childbearing, <S%G5042><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> They Abide <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sanctification <S%G38><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Discreetness. <S%G4997><s%>
